name: Adventures Of Florida Man
description: Celebrating the wild news stories of the Internet's most colorful superhero, Florida Man, and his super-friend (and common law wife) Florida Woman, it's The Improbable Adventures of Florida Man! A Text game that is played like Two Lies and a Truth, all you have to do is choose which of three Florida Man headlines you think really happened.  Often hilarious, sometimes perplexing, occasionally frightening; come try the Improbable Adventures of Florida Man!
